remarks: The meet of a poset commutes.  (This may not be a theorem under other definitions of meet.)  (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
meetcom.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
meetcom.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
meetcomALT $p |- ( ( K e. V /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X ./\ Y ) = ( Y ./\ X ) ) $.
